EmailTemplate.name: Incomplete references - new apps
EmailTemplate.subject: URGENT: Check your references on the staffing portal!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact us on seasonalroles@the-challenge.org.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
In the final few days before the NCS Summer programme finally kicks off, it's imperative that all of our seasonal staff have completed all of their 'compliance' measures. This includes obtaining a valid DBS certificate, completing their Health, Safeguarding and Inclusion form, and submitting contact details for satisfactory referees.
Our records show that you haven't yet submitted one or both of your referees in the Essential Information section of your application. We cannot let you work until we have received two satisfactory references for you.
What do I need to do?
Head to the Essential Information page on the staffing website and check your References 'status'. This will indicate whether your referee(s) is blank, unsuitable or unresponsive.
If your referee is blank, please update your application with contact details for a suitable referee within 5 days.
If your referee is unsuitable, you will need to update your application with contact details for an alternative referee within five days. Please note that a suitable referee knows you from a (1) educational, (2) employment, or (3) voluntary capacity. We cannot accept personal referees (such as friends or family members), or two referees from the same institution.
If your referee is unresponsive, we will have unsuccessfully tried to contact them on no less than 3 occasions. Please contact your referee and check that they are willing to provide a reference for you. If they are, ask them to get in touch with our HR partners Evolution Recruitment on staffing.support@the-challenge.org, or phone them on 0208 673 2211. If they're not happy to provide a reference for you, you'll need to give us contact details for another referee.
Any questions?
If you have any questions about our references policy, or are having trouble securing two references, please contact your Staffing Associate directly.
Best wishes,
The Challenge Staffing Team
